config.shulkerboxtooltip.title: ShulkerBoxTooltip Configuration
Toggles the shulker box preview.
Effectively disables the mod
config.shulkerboxtooltip.lock_preview.de:
Locks the preview window above the tooltip.
When locked, the window will not adapt when out of screen.
config.shulkerboxtooltip.swap_modes.desc:
Swaps the preview modes.
If true, pressing shift will show the full preview instead.
config.shulkerboxtooltip.tooltip_type.de:
The tooltip to use.
Vanilla: the vanilla tooltip (shows the first 5 items)
Modded: the mod's tooltip
None: no tooltip
